title: POP3 Switching off
content: I use Thunderbird as my email client and BT/Microsoft are switching off POP3 next week, which means as far as I understand, that I won't be able to download my btconnect emails on to my computer. Is there anything I can do to ensure that I receive the emails, without having to log in to webmail? Thanks Sue Minns
creator: sminns

title: emails not displaying correctly
content: Hello, I've noticed that emails are not displaying correctly - see attached screengrab. In the 'From' column they are all saying from Vicky Mohring (me) however that's not correct as it should be the 'from' names of all my different clients. Then, when I click on any of them the email either doesn't load and in the email details it lists the info of the last email I was looking at. Have they all become corrupt? It only seems to be in emails dating from 2022 and earlier. Thanks
creator: vicky16

title: emails
content:
Good Afternoon. I have been using Thunderbird for many years but it has suddenly stopped transferring my emails from my tiscali (talktalk) account although I can see there is new mail in it. T/B has recently updated and I wonder if that has stopped all my mail from arriving in the inbox. I am an old lady technophobe so easy language please. 

                          Many thanks
creator: susanburland

title: Interruption of Thunderbird service
content:
I just received the following message from GoDaddy. "There are email accounts in your organization using Basic Authentication, which Microsoft will no longer support after 05/26/2023. You'll still be able to access your email through your browser, but not from an email app, such as Outlook or Apple Mail â€” don't worry, none of your emails will be lost.

In order to continue using your email apps, you need to update your settings from POP/IMAP to Exchange for each device you use to check your email. This also applies to other users who are set up within your account using POP/IMAP settings. Here's how to update your email settings."

GoDaddy told me that I'd have to convert to Outlook or get my mail through my browser for my desktop, but that my phone would continue to work with Thunderbird.

I want to continue using the Thunderbird interface on my desktop. Can I do that?
creator: johnc8

title: Thunderbird 102.11.0 - IMAP problem accessing BTconnect email
content:
Thunderbird 102.11.0. Windows 10.

IMAP account set up for btconnect email address (previously accessed by POP).

Config editor used to change: 

network.dns.disableIPv6

to "true".

Fails with "....User is authenticated but not connected."

Tried downloading and installing Thunderbird on a virgin Windows 11 laptop and, after account details are entered, auto configuration goes to IMAP and then fails with "Configuration cannot be verified."

The same Windows 11 laptop accesses the account perfectly from the Outlook web app - so the account details are correct.

Can anyone help?
creator: trusley_mike

title: Singnatures in Thunderbird
content:
Hi, I have several issues regarding signatures -

1) how do i make a signature consisting of some text as well as an image - i have created my signature in a new email, saved it as a HTML file and used it as a file for my signature..

2) but when i create a new email - it shows for like a 1 second and then disappears.. doesnt appear in replies or forwards..

3) i tried to instead just use an image as a signature.. again just shows up for 1 second in replies and forwards and disappears..

have set all settings as instructed in the various answers in the forums..

Please assist. Thanks
creator: milindmajithia

title: Thunberbird 102.4.0 Blank Screen on startup
content:
Running TB 102.4.0 on Windows 10 off a SSD drive. System was running fine this morning but when I started TB in the afternoon I have a blank screen as attached. Top menu items are displayed but cannot access Tools > Account Settings or Settings. Tried restarting in Safe Mode but no change. Deactivated Anstivirus (Kaspersky) but no change either. Looked and saw this has happened to other people but cannot replicate any of the solutions. Error console message attached. Cannot access More Troubleshooting Mode. Messages are downloading but I cannot see them - but they are no longer on the server. Only File Menu item that works is Write Message.

Appreciate any feedback.
creator: shamit

title: With google mail account, emails with larger attachment remain in the Outbox, there is no error message
content: With google mail account, emails with larger attachment remain in the Outbox. There is no error message. When I reopen later on Thunderbird it gives me a message that I have unsent message. I don't see any attempt to send the message, notification, progression bar, etc. Using Mail for MacOS, and the same Gmail account, the email with the same attachment (18Mb) can be sent without problems. What's wrong with Thunderbird?
creator: titustucan

title: outgoing email settings not valid
content: As of May 16, I can receive emails but not send. The outgoing SMTP settings have been verified, and I have no problems if using Spectrum's webmail (aside from its garish awkwardness). They have suggested it may be a recent update on your end. The program is up to date. Is there a solution?
creator: Dismay

title: email account present but no emails transferring to new computer
content: Trying to transfer email accounts from old to new computer, but cannot access any messages on two accounts, both gmail, but a third has transferred correctly. One of those accounts contain additional folders accessible via the inbox. Followed instructions as shown on your transfer information page. Both Thunderbird instances are the same version. I can send and receive to the empty accounts and all others within Thunderbird. The account data is contained within the transferred Profiles/Mail folder but does not show within the program. All other data, including calendar events, have transferred successfully. Where have I gone wrong, or how can I remedy the situation?
creator: krokususa

title: Cannot add hotmail account to Thunderbird
content:
I have been trying for hours to get my hotmail email added to Thunderbird to no avail. I have generated an app password, been trying all manner of advanced settings for the incoming and outcoming server settings, and no dice. Does anyone have a simple guide to what I need the settings to be for my hotmail account to add to Thunderbird??

I have the incoming IMAP settings as outlook.office365.com, port 993, SSL/TLS and have tried all the different authentication options. For outgoing, i have smtp.office.365.com, port 587, security STARTTLS, and have tried all the authentication methods. I have tried both my actual password, and a generated app password.
creator: stefanie.maxwell.orr

title: Disable shortcut keys
content:
Hi

A friend is having issue with Thunderbird shortcut keys tripping her up when they are pressed by mistake. Often recovery is not easy since one doesn't know what one has pressed by mistake! I've looked for ways to disable shortcut keys but the old add-ons that https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/keyboard-shortcuts-thunderbird?redirectslug=keyboard-shortcuts&redirectlocale=en-US lists are no longer supported.

TBKeys Lite *is* supported in current versions but using its "Unset singles" doesn't seem to stop shortcut keys. The extension says it is aimed at power users i.e. not intended to simplify life for basic users. Given this, I imagine asking how to configure it for this will receive short shrift!

Can anyone explain how to disable shortcut keys?
creator: mr-b

title: Thunderbird deleted Inbox, Sent box, and all archived email folders
content:
I use Thunderbird to manage my Gmail account and every week, I backup the Profile file.

Yesterday - for some reason that is unknown, all of my emails in the Inbox, Sent box, and archived folders disappeared. I opened Gmail in a browser - the same situation. New emails are coming in and I can send out emails - but the historical files aren't there.

Is there a way to reload the last saved Profile into Thunderbird to retrieve the emails up to the date of the backup?

Should I uninstall Thunderbird - and then re-install it and load in the old Profile?
creator: michael.r.root

title: Thunderbird Linux Email version 102.11.0 (64-bit) repetitively hangs?  Help!!!
content: Thunderbird version 102.11.0 (64-bit) constantly hangs with no response for like 25 seconds during each instance of a delay! This has been going on now since like 6 previous versions and upgrades! Thunderbird version 102.11.0 (64-bit) running on Fedora Linux 6.2.15-200.fc37.x86_64 constantly hangs even in Troubleshooting mode? I tried re-indexing the Database to no avail? Thunderbird has been reinstalled as well so the issue must be in my Profile and/or Database? I am running in Troubleshooting Mode right now and experiencing the same behavior! Help me resolve this please! I really gets bad when I try to compose an email! I experience multiple delays as i draft an email!
creator: KevinPark5

title: Thunderbird will not work on a new PC, following installation.
content: Just got a new PC. Was intending to use Outlook... but, after a lot of hassle, that would not work, despite having copied all the settings from my old PC to the new one. So, after about four hours or more, and still nowhere, thought I would try Thunderbird. Installed it, and input my name, email address, and a password, and it would not work. Never managed to connect to the server. So, have literally wasted a whole day, and the new PC still will not do emails! Very baffled!
creator: adbro275

title: Migration Updates
content:
(POP3 client accounts on Win10 Home)

Moved my Postbox v3.x POP3 client Profile (mbox, msf formats) to new Laptop with fresh install of old saved version 52.8.0 Thunderbird Client POP3.

Upon first open after the Profile copy to TBird noticed a Popup saying migration updating. Checking version it had updated from 52.8.0 to 60.9.1 (32bit)

QUESTION: Just curious if anyone else has had this happen (?) and is this something that TBird does on it's own to fix any migrated Profile issues regardless of Update settings?

(BTW looking at new Acct settings that came with copied Postbox Profile it still had the [ ] Check for new messages at startup UNCHECKED. All my Mail and settings were there and functioning) [ EDIT CORRECTION, the above BTW line was my confused error of presentation. I meant to say that TBird Options->Advanced->Update it had a selection dot by->Never check for updates. I apologize for my sloppiness therein. ]
creator: RB2124

title: Config Editor questions
content:
Working currently with Thunderbird version 60.9.1 have following questions.

(1) On my version a right click (or double click) gets you to menu choices. However I did not see a Save. I surmise exiting config editor saves any changes or do you also have to click OK once back in the Options-General Tab to save the config editor changes?

(2a) Also noticed if create new item name with typo, there is no way to edit the name or any way to delete the item. I was able (with TBird closed) to delete or edit the item name typo in prefs.js.

(2b) I read some folks (with Thunderbird closed) are just editing items directly in prefs.js. However I noticed some items are not in prefs.js like accessibility.AOM.enabled Did a file content search of entire Tbird Profile root folder and I can't find accessibility.AOM.enabled in any file. Just curious how one might get rid of an item they didn't want or need in config editor?
creator: RB2124

title: Text Encoding Unicode or Western?
content: I've always kept Text Encoding set to Unicode. Are there times when Western would be better?

title: Setting how inbox displays messages
content:
I run emails from yahoo, gmail, live & hotmail on TBird and have for years. Instead of simply always displaying the inbox contents from the top message down, it has switched to displaying from the 2 oldest unreads down, with all those above unviewable until I scroll up. I have no idea why they'd think anyone would want that! How do I get just display every inbox & folder from the top message down, as it did for DECADES before a recent change?

Thanks
